name: getColorClassName
description: Returns a class based on the context a color is being used and its slug.

tags.title: param
tags.description: Context/place where color is being used e.g: background, text etc...
tags.name: colorContextName

tags.title: param
tags.description: Slug of the color.
tags.name: colorSlug

tags.title: return
tags.description: String with the class corresponding to the color in the provided context.

name: getColorObjectByAttributeValues
description:
Provided an array of color objects as set by the theme or by the editor defaults,
and the values of the defined color or custom color returns a color object describing the color.

tags.title: param
tags.description: Array of color objects as set by the theme or by the editor defaults.
tags.name: colors

tags.title: param
tags.description: A string containing the color slug.
tags.name: definedColor

tags.title: param
tags.description: A string containing the customColor value.
tags.name: customColor

tags.title: return
tags.description:
If definedColor is passed and the name is found in colors,
                  the color object exactly as set by the theme or editor defaults is returned.
                  Otherwise, an object that just sets the color is defined.

name: getColorObjectByColorValue
description: Provided an array of color objects as set by the theme or by the editor defaults, and a color value returns the color object matching that value or undefined.

tags.title: param
tags.description: Array of color objects as set by the theme or by the editor defaults.
tags.name: colors

tags.title: param
tags.description: A string containing the color value.
tags.name: colorValue

tags.title: return
tags.description:
Returns the color object included in the colors array whose color property equals colorValue.
                  Returns undefined if no color object matches this requirement.

name: createCustomColorsHOC
description:
A higher-order component factory for creating a 'withCustomColors' HOC, which handles color logic
for class generation color value, retrieval and color attribute setting.

Use this higher-order component to work with a custom set of colors.

tags.title: example
param
tags.description: The array of color objects (name, slug, color, etc... ).
tags.name: colorsArray

tags.title: return
tags.description: Higher-order component.

name: withColors
description:
A higher-order component, which handles color logic for class generation color value, retrieval and color attribute setting.

For use with the default editor/theme color palette.

tags.title: example
param
tags.description:
The arguments can be strings or objects. If the argument is an object,
                                       it should contain the color attribute name as key and the color context as value.
                                       If the argument is a string the value should be the color attribute name,
                                       the color context is computed by applying a kebab case transform to the value.
                                       Color context represents the context/place where the color is going to be used.
                                       The class name of the color is generated using 'has' followed by the color name
                                       and ending with the color context all in kebab case e.g: has-green-background-color.
tags.name: colorTypes

tags.title: return
tags.description: Higher-order component.

name: getFontSize
description:
Returns the font size object based on an array of named font sizes and the namedFontSize and customFontSize values.
	If namedFontSize is undefined or not found in fontSizes an object with just the size value based on customFontSize is returned.

tags.title: param
tags.description: Array of font size objects containing at least the "name" and "size" values as properties.
tags.name: fontSizes

tags.title: param
tags.description: Content of the font size attribute (slug).
tags.name: fontSizeAttribute

tags.title: param
tags.description: Contents of the custom font size attribute (value).
tags.name: customFontSizeAttribute

tags.title: return
tags.description:
If fontSizeAttribute is set and an equal slug is found in fontSizes it returns the font size object for that slug.
					 Otherwise, an object with just the size value based on customFontSize is returned.

name: getFontSizeClass
description: Returns a class based on fontSizeName.

tags.title: param
tags.description: Slug of the fontSize.
tags.name: fontSizeSlug

tags.title: return
tags.description:
String with the class corresponding to the fontSize passed.
                 The class is generated by appending 'has-' followed by fontSizeSlug in kebabCase and ending with '-font-size'.

name: withFontSizes
description:
Higher-order component, which handles font size logic for class generation,
font size value retrieval, and font size change handling.

tags.title: param
tags.description:
The arguments should all be strings
                                 Each string contains the font size attribute name e.g: 'fontSize'.
tags.name: args

tags.title: return
tags.description: Higher-order component.

name: SETTINGS_DEFAULTS
description:
The default editor settings

 alignWide                     boolean       Enable/Disable Wide/Full Alignments
 availableLegacyWidgets        Array         Array of objects representing the legacy widgets available.
 colors                        Array         Palette colors
 disableCustomColors           boolean       Whether or not the custom colors are disabled
 fontSizes                     Array         Available font sizes
 disableCustomFontSizes        boolean       Whether or not the custom font sizes are disabled
 imageSizes                    Array         Available image sizes
 maxWidth                      number        Max width to constraint resizing
 allowedBlockTypes             boolean|Array Allowed block types
 hasFixedToolbar               boolean       Whether or not the editor toolbar is fixed
 hasPermissionsToManageWidgets boolean       Whether or not the user is able to manage widgets.
 focusMode                     boolean       Whether the focus mode is enabled or not
 styles                        Array         Editor Styles
 isRTL                         boolean       Whether the editor is in RTL mode
 bodyPlaceholder               string        Empty post placeholder
 titlePlaceholder              string        Empty title placeholder
